name: KimodameshiGolf
description:
The Kimodameshi Golf Club (a.k.a. "Kimogol") is a very ordinary club that can be found anywhere in a certain university.

They are a group of young people who love golf and haunted places.

The player controls them and just plays golf.

Controls:
WASD to make the character walk.
Shift + WASD to make the character run.

Left-click the mouse when the player is close to the ball to prepare for the shot.
Left-click again to hit the shot.

If you hit an OB or land in the water, you will be chased by a ghost, so run to a locker and wait for the ghost to leave.
If the ghost grabs you, the game is over.

*There are currently three playable stages.
*Contains sudden loud noises and violent scenes.
*The objective of the game is not to solve psychic phenomena.
*The number of stages will be increased in the future.
*Multiplayer is currently under preparation.
*This game can be distributed on video distribution sites by both individuals and corporations. You may also monetize the game.
